rComments: This was the worst class I have ever taken in my undergraduate degree. In one assignment, this professor had technical difficulties on her computer, AND istead of rectifying this problem with me and other students, she decided to fail at least 5 of us. I shouldnt have had to fight for the right to rectify technical difficulties. DO NOT TAKE CLASS

Her lectures were uselessand she wasted too much time with irrelevant anecdotes. The T.A.s were the ones that actually gave valuable information on production. Rather than giving helpful feedback she teased and intimidated our class. When we had external actors for projects she would interfere on set and make a scene, leaving actors uncomfortable.

hard professor, i took her CCT357 photography, she marked it really hard despite there was a two-month strike. she still gave us high 60s. And she is a bit mean to students when we were presenting, she critiqued us hard.

Horrible teacher! Not that the work was hard, thats determined by your work ethic. But she is an extremely hard marker. For someone who had experience with video and video editing I found this class didn't really help expand my knowledge in the subject.
teacherRatingTags: ['Group projects', "Skip class? You won't pass.", 'Tough grader']

rComments: Great Prof. sees right through your bullsht so don't even try.  sees and appreciates real talent so if you are honest and skillful you will get a great mark. got 86 in all her classes.

Very very unhelpful! She was very mean and cold as well and didn't care whether we understood photoshop or not...the worst tutorials at sheridan ever! i can't help but wonder why i took the course and didn't get warned about her in time! too many books to buy and she naturally assumes we have the recommended books! the course ruins your GPA!!!
